venue.name: The Creative Source Dance & Fitness Center

item.description:
Cumbia & Cocktails Dance Fitness Party

With Guest Dance/Fitness Instructors from CT & Western MA!

The Creative Source, LLC Dance & Fitness Center

56 Arbor Street, Suite 103

Hartford, CT 06106


6pm registration
6:30-7:45 Cumbia, Cumbia, and more Cumbia
7:30-8:30 Cocktails, Refreshments & Conversation
$10 in advance / $15 @ the door

(Cash, Credit Cards, Paypal and Checks accepted)

Tickets may be purchased at any of of the classes at TCS

or send $10 to jeanne@thecreativesource.org to www.paypal.com

and put "CCDP" in the notes

ONLY 40 TICKETS ARE BEING SOLD TO THIS EVENT!

Directions: I-84, Sisson Avenue/Capitol Avenue exit. Take a left at the end of the exit. Take the 3rd right on Arbor Street. If you go past U-Haul, you've gone too far. We are in the same building as Real Art Ways. Enter either through the side green door (first parking lot on your right), or through the back where additional parking is located near the Jumping Frong Bookstore.

For more information, contact: Jeanne C. Warren at 860-841-7344 or jeanne@thecreativesource.org
item.how_to_find_us: We are in the same building as The Real Artways

group.name: Zumba Fitness @ The Creative Source Dance & Fitness Center
